function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Fatigue and wariness in local populations due to lack of engagement by external agencies","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to provide specific guidance and protective equipment for essential workers","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate alternatives for mass religious gatherings","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"States of emergency and ’emergency thinking’ may preclude locally led and adapted responses, hindering effectiveness and harm reduction","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Precarious position of migrant workers","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Breakdown in social protection due to school closures","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk of virus exposure for people with disabilities due to reliance on others and limited ability to self-isolate","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heightened social tensions and security risks in informal settlements, including criminal activity and strained socioeconomic conditions","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited livelihoods and savings may lead to economic vulnerability and inability to access vital resources like water","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"People working through illness due to need to make a living","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Epidemiological vulnerability to covid-19, especially for those over 70 years of age and with underlying health conditions","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential gender differences in infection rates, with men being almost twice as likely to die as women","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restrictive control measures may not be sustainable","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Swift action needed before widespread transmission in lmic cities takes hold","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inappropriate responses to disease outbreaks in informal settlements","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of resources and access to healthcare based on income levels","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to digital technology may exacerbate disparities in pandemic response and containment","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Socioeconomic inequalities and healthcare disparities amplified by digital health initiatives","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and surveillance concerns with aggressive contact tracing","category":"Privacy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Varied success in managing the burden of covid-19","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective pandemic management despite preparedness","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restrictions on levels of crowding on public transport","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fewer office workers in the city","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased sanitation requirements","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring people for high temperatures or signs of illness","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in maintaining the supply of vital food and medicine due to panic buying and disrupted supply chains","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High concentration of people in cities limiting the ability to travel to alternative sources of supply","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of hospitals reaching capacity and frontline medical personnel facing scarcity of resources and access to necessary items","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detailed personal location data could be misused for tracking individuals without their consent, leading to privacy violations","category":"Privacy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased surveillance and tracking of individuals may lead to a sense of intrusion and loss of personal freedom","category":"Privacy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for misuse of personal health data for discriminatory practices, including employment, insurance, and access to resources","category":"Privacy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High transmission risk in densely populated cities impacting community well-being","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of smart city technologies due to lockdown and reduced city activity","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Civil-liberty concerns due to increased surveillance and personal data collection","category":"Privacy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accountability for poorly designed clinical trials and wasteful research","category":"Accountability","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unproven treatments being peddled by influential figures","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rollout of mass drug-administration campaigns in response to unsubstantiated recommendations, causing diversion of drug supplies from neglected disease programs","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The decrease in demand for physical commercial service facilities in the community life circle may lead to economic impact","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprotected working hours of parents due to online teaching","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprotected working hours of parents due to online education","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High frequency of use in medical and health facilities can increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recruiting respondents from the community without strict criteria for health status","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sufficient understanding to design a high-quality community","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study of lifestyle changes before, during, and after covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reshaping of community lifestyles in the post-pandemic period","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of community acceptance of self-quarantine measures","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate case identification, containment, and resource allocation","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficult decisions under uncertainty and time constraints","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the sustainability of intensive public health policies and public reception until the end of the epidemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate support for schools, businesses, and furloughed workers","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"}]}
